body:
Declare  @RN int, @TagID int,@cIplikMakinaID int
Declare  @IplikMakineleri Table (RN int, MakinaID int)
Set @TagID = 7
Set @RN = 1
Insert  @IplikMakineleri(RN, MakinaID)
Values
 (1,2184)
,(2,2185)
,(3,2186)
,(4,2187)
,(5,2188)
,(6,2189)
,(7,6064)
,(8,6057)
,(9,6066)
,(10,6062)
,(11,6091)
,(12,6092)
,(13,6093)
,(14,6094)
,(15,6063)

while @TagID <= 111 Begin
	Set @cIplikMakinaID = Null 
	Select  @cIplikMakinaID = MakinaID From  @IplikMakineleri Where RN = @RN
	Insert  LeoBox.IT01_Tag(TagID, DeviceID, TagTypeID, MakineID, TagName, TagCode, AddDate, IsCumulative, TagAktif, IsBoyaOtomasyon)
	Select  ROW_NUMBER() Over (Order By T.ID asc) + @TagID, T.DeviceID, T.TagTypeID, @cIplikMakinaID, T.TagName, T.TagCode, T.AddDate, T.IsCumulative, T.TagAktif, T.IsBoyaOtomasyon
	From  LeoBox.IT01_Tag T 
	Where  T.DeviceID Like '%leo%' And T.TagAktif  = 1
	Set @TagID = @TagID +  7
	Set @RN  =@RN  +1
End
